roleset.name: cause tissue to die
roleset.note: NECROTIZE-V NOTES: Based on data in medical QA corpus ; adjectival 'necrotic' added by Julia based on medi-tmprl (from necrotize.101-v)
NECROTIC-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from necrotic.101-j)

example.name: necrotize-v: Arg1
example.text: The patient's bowel was quicky necrotizing.

example.name: necrotic-j
example.text: Received fresh labeled " " right pelvic side wall lymph node " " is a 1.2 x 1.0 x 0.7 cm lymph node which-1 [*-1] grossly is necrotic .
